text: [[Atur]]'s Great Hall of Feast and Fortune—commonly referred to as the "Feast Hall"—is one of the grandest temples of [[Olladra]] in the [[Five Nations]]. In addition to traditional services for the [[Sovereign Host]], it’s the finest party venue in the city, and the sounds of coins and dice can be heard at all hours in the gaming hall.
title: Great Hall of Feast and Fortune
tooltip: grand temple of Olladra in Atur
